glossentry.glossdef: The Managed Element CNF provides the charging function in NCC. ME includes the charging application and the database for managing all subscriber and device records, including the dynamic data updated as a result of charging transactions. ME produces charging data records (CDRs) to record the details of all transactions.

MariaDB is an open source database that supports continuity and open collaboration. Keycloak Web SSO data is stored in MariaDB. This includes SM user authentication details comprised of usernames and encrypted passwords. The MariaDB component with MaxScale provides tools and support for installing and managing MariaDB server database instances.
A Mobile Network Code (MNC) is used in combination with a Mobile Country Code (MCC), also known as a MCC or MNC tuple, to uniquely identify a mobile phone operator or carrier.
Mobile Country Code and Mobile Network Code
Mobile Directory Number is a specific phone number that is dialled to reach a mobile phone.
Managed Elements are the individual manageable and logical elements that perform payment, policy, and charging related functions for operators.
Memcached is an open source distributed memory caching system. It is used for speeding up dynamic web applications by reducing database load.

Microservice architecture is a term used to describe the practice of breaking up an application into a series of smaller, more specialized parts, each of which communicate with one another across common interfaces such as APIs and REST interfaces like HTTP. A microservice may be provided by a collection of pods working together to provide a service.
Mobile Identification Number is a unique 10 digit number used by a wireless carrier to identify a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging Service is a standard way to send messages that include multimedia content to and from mobile phones.
Multimedia Messaging Service is a method to send and receive message that include multimedia message.
Mobile Network Code is used to identify the country to which the subscriber belongs.
Mobile Network Operator is the service provider who provides wireless voice and data communication to its subscribers.
Mobile Number Portability enables mobile telephone users to retain their existing mobile telephone numbers while changing from the current mobile network operator to a new operator.
Mobile Originated refers to a message sent by the subscriber from a mobile handset.
A call originating from a mobile device in the GSM network which is routed through the core network to the destination party.

Recognizes systems not working at rated performance, or not working at all. The NCC monitors numerous parameters in a network along with the health and integrity of the servers. The system health is a resultant value derived from the health of constituent components. The NCC monitors the components of an ME and SM using a heartbeat, which allows a site to communicate status about their own connectivity and state, as well as their view of the other known NCC sites. All system components register themselves with Monitoring. All vital services in a site must be present with a status of UP before Diameter traffic can start in the system. This applies to system starts and restarts. If the system components are not ready on the initial start up, the system will not start and you will get a time out message. Ensure the services are all UP. If you are restarting the system, you can use the sps-status tool to verify service status and take the necessary actions to ensure services are all UP.
Media Resource Function provides media related functions, such as, playing of tones and announcements.
The Multiple Services Credit Control (MSCC) AVP is used for granting and reporting quota for each bucket (rating-group).
Mobile Station International Subscriber Directory Number is a unique number defined by the E.164 numbering plan which identifies a mobile phone number internationally.
Mobile terminated offers functions such as radio transmission and hand over, speech encoding and decoding, error detection and correction, or signalling and access to the SIM.
The Mobile terminated Call is when the subscriber receives a call.
Mobile terminated SMS message is a capability for a mobile phone or other device to receive standard short text messages.
